## IMathLimit.UpperLimit 属性

指定上下限

```csharp
public bool UpperLimit { get; set; }
```

### 示例

示例:

```csharp
[C#]
IMathLimit limitElement = new MathLimit(new MathematicalText("lim"), new MathematicalText("𝑛→∞"));
limitElement.UpperLimit = false;
```
